title: Enable test-runner-agent to report encountered issues
description: Extend test-runner-agent to detect patterns in test failures that indicate bugs or features we need, and automatically report these issues back to the system by creating draft bug/feature entries.
user_impact: Improves autonomous bug discovery and tracking
resolution_notes: Added comprehensive issue detection and reporting capabilities to test-runner-agent including pattern recognition, duplicate detection, automated issue creation with templates, and report formatting.
